description: [``botocore``] Added ability to prefix search on attribute value for ListThings API.

[``botocore``] Amazon Transcribe now supports creating custom language models in the following languages: British English (en-GB), Australian English (en-AU), Indian Hindi (hi-IN), and US Spanish (es-US).
[``botocore``] Support for customer managed KMS encryption of Comprehend custom models
[``botocore``] Minor documentation updates and link updates.
[``botocore``] AWS Batch adds support for Amazon EFS File System
[``botocore``] Added the ability to assign tag values to Detective behavior graphs. Tag values can be used for attribute-based access control, and for cost allocation for billing.
[``botocore``] Add Sidewalk support to APIs: GetWirelessDevice, ListWirelessDevices, GetWirelessDeviceStatistics. Add Gateway connection status in GetWirelessGatewayStatistics API.
[``botocore``] 1. Added a new parameter RegionConcurrencyType in OperationPreferences. 2. Changed the name of AccountUrl to AccountsUrl in DeploymentTargets parameter.
[``botocore``] Add ImageId input parameter to CreateEnvironmentEC2 endpoint. New parameter enables creation of environments with different AMIs.
[``botocore``] This release adds MACsec support to AWS Direct Connect
[``botocore``] Enable customers to share access to their Redshift clusters from other VPCs (including VPCs from other accounts).
[``botocore``] This release adds support for mobile device access rules management in Amazon WorkMail.
[``botocore``] Minor documentation updates and link updates.
[``botocore``] Minor documentation updates and link updates.
